name: Sala de Despiece
review:
An amazing meal!

It's an omakase style dinner, pre fixe, with the ability to add on sides, but with the amount of food, there is no need for adding.... Amazing, unlike anything. Smart concept, I've ever experienced before. 
Make reservations and come open minded to try things, you typically don't like. 
And.... Ok so this review is technically for the SDD2 location, but they are not on Yelp so I will add it here!

Made a reservation a few weeks prior and came for....

name: Burnout
review:
Over the last eight months living in Madrid, I have tried a slew of burger places, but Burnout is by far the best. Though the burgers are very messy to eat,.... I am sorry to say that the hype connected to this restaurant is way over the top.  My friend brought me here because he said he had an excellent visit last.... We had the prifix menu. €11 included a drink. A burger and a desert. 
The desert was not good. We had the chocolate cake and the carrot cake. Carrot cake....

Small restaurant with very friendly helpful waitstaff. Ordered the tasting menu which is a good mix of the tapas. Would recommend....

name: Bacira
review:

I honestly can't remember the last meal I had at this price point -- $115 US.... MUST HAVE THE FRESH TUNA AND ALSO THE RISOTTO!!!

Everything we ate here was top notch. The flavors were all unlike anything I've ever ate. The atmosphere....

Great place , good vibe, the food is good, a bit pricey though for what it is 
Portions are small ( at least for the octopus which was fantastic but way too.... This goes worse and worse. I was recently forced to come here by some friends, and literally this is not a place for people who know about restaurants. More.... Trendy, loud and lively. Great place for a fun night out. review:

There's no seating inside, so this place is strictly take-away.... Really good take out spot. And you can order online! I had the gingerboy vegetable curry and jasmine rice. It was quite good, but it's pricy for what you get.. Love this little spot in Madrid. Really impressed with the quality of the food and the spices used. The food is delicious, the service is fast, the wifi is free and unlimited. All things that are hard to find in a Madrid cafe. Toast and tomato, coffee, and....

name: Pimiento Verde

review:
Lalúa is by far my favorite place for ice cream in Madrid. They have so many flavors in almost overwhelming!

This place gets packed, especially when it.... My boyfriend and I have tried gelato in Argentina and all throughout Italy, and Kalúa is as close as you can get to that quality while in Madrid. Kalúa not.... Delicious gelato! Some of the best I've ever had!! I went back two days in a row because it was so good! Highly recommend the Oreo and mango!.

review:
This was a great brunch place. It has a very cute atmosphere and the staff were very nice. The french toast was wonderful.. El Ferry is located in a great location, just outside of the Bilbao Metro. The decor is a modern take on an american style diner and is very welcoming.

We.... El Ferry a true 50s diner that mixes it up nicely and is willing to try new things. The Weekend brunch is among the best in town as other reviewers have....
